input_str:
Jul 29, 2015 8 min read

This tutorial leads through an example on how to build and use AngularJS 1 with the new JavaScript standard ECMAScript 6 (short ES6 or also ES2015). It does neither explain how to use AngularJS itself or the new syntax of ES6.

Why did I do this? I basically wanted to write an AngularJS 1 (since AngularJS 2 is still too beta at the time of writing), but wanted to use some of the nice features of
